00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #include "LRU_List.h"
00092 #include "log_functions.h"
00093 #include "HashData.h"
00094 #include "HashTable.h"
00095 #include "fsal.h"
00096 #include "cache_inode.h"
00097 #include "cache_content.h"
00098 
00099 #include <unistd.h>
00100 #include <sys/types.h>
00101 #include <sys/param.h>
00102 #include <time.h>
00103 #include <pthread.h>
00104 #include <errno.h>
00105 #include <dirent.h>
00106 #include <string.h>
00107 
00118 cache_content_status_t cache_content_crash_recover( unsigned short               exportid,
00119                                                     unsigned int                 index,
00120                                                     unsigned int                 mod,
00121                                                     cache_content_client_t     * pclient_data,
00122                                                     cache_inode_client_t       * pclient_inode,
00123                                                     hash_table_t               * ht,
00124                                                     fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext,
00125                                                     cache_content_status_t     * pstatus ) 
00126 {
00127   DIR * cache_directory ;
00128   cache_content_dirinfo_t export_directory ;
00129 
00130   char cache_exportdir[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00131   char fullpath[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00132  
00133   struct dirent *  direntp ; 
00134   struct dirent dirent_export ; 
00135 
00136   int       found_export_id ;
00137   u_int64_t inum ;
00138 
00139   off_t size_in_cache ;
00140 
00141   cache_entry_t           inode_entry ;
00142   cache_entry_t         * pentry         = NULL ;
00143   cache_content_entry_t * pentry_content = NULL ;
00144   cache_inode_status_t    cache_inode_status ;
00145   cache_content_status_t  cache_content_status ;
00146  
00147   cache_content_dirinfo_t iter_dir ;
00148  
00149   fsal_attrib_list_t      fsal_attr ;
00150   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsal_data ;
00151   
00152   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00153 
00154   /* Open the cache directory */
00155   if( ( cache_directory = opendir( pclient_data->cache_dir ) ) == NULL )
00156     {
00157       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR  ;
00158       return *pstatus ;
00159     }
00160   /* read the cache directory */
00161   while( ( direntp = readdir( cache_directory ) ) != NULL )
00162     {
00163 
00164 
00165       /* . and .. are of no interest */
00166       if( !strcmp( direntp->d_name, "." ) || !strcmp( direntp->d_name, ".." ) )
00167         continue ;
00168 
00169       if( ( found_export_id = cache_content_get_export_id( direntp->d_name ) ) >= 0 )
00170         {
00171           DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00172                              "Directory cache for Export ID %d has been found", found_export_id ) ;
00173           snprintf( cache_exportdir, MAXPATHLEN, "%s/%s", pclient_data->cache_dir, direntp->d_name ) ;
00174           
00175           
00176           if( cache_content_local_cache_opendir( cache_exportdir, &(export_directory) ) == FALSE )
00177             {
00178               *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR  ;
00179               closedir( cache_directory ) ;
00180               return *pstatus ;
00181             }
00182 
00183           /* Reads the directory content (a single thread for the moment) */
00184             
00185           while( cache_content_local_cache_dir_iter( &export_directory, &dirent_export,index, mod )  )
00186             {
00187               /* . and .. are of no interest */
00188               if( !strcmp( dirent_export.d_name, "." ) || !strcmp( dirent_export.d_name, ".." ) )
00189                 continue ;
00190 
00191               if( ( inum = cache_content_get_inum( dirent_export.d_name ) ) > 0 )
00192                 {
00193                   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00194                                      "Cache entry for File ID %llx has been found", inum ) ;
00195 
00196                   /* Get the content of the file */
00197                   sprintf( fullpath, "%s/%s/%s", pclient_data->cache_dir, direntp->d_name, dirent_export.d_name ) ;
00198                   
00199                   if( ( cache_inode_status = cache_inode_reload_content( fullpath,
00200                                                                          &inode_entry ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00201                     {
00202                       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00203                                          "File Content Cache record for File ID %llx is unreadable", inum ) ;
00204                       continue ;
00205                     }
00206                   else
00207                     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00208                                        "File Content Cache record for File ID %llx : READ OK", inum ) ;
00209 
00210                   /* Populating the cache_inode... */
00211                   fsal_data.handle = inode_entry.object.file.handle ;
00212                   fsal_data.cookie = 0 ;
00213                   
00214                   if( ( pentry = cache_inode_get( &fsal_data, 
00215                                                   &fsal_attr, 
00216                                                   ht, 
00217                                                   pclient_inode, 
00218                                                   pcontext, 
00219                                                   &cache_inode_status ) ) == NULL )
00220                    {
00221                     DisplayLogJd(  pclient_inode->log_outputs, "Error adding cached inode for file ID %llx, error=%d", 
00222                                    inum, cache_inode_status ) ;
00223                     continue ;
00224                    }
00225                   else
00226                     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_inode->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00227                                        "Cached inode added successfully for file ID %llx", inum ) ;
00228                  
00229                   /* Get the size from the cache */
00230                   if(  ( size_in_cache = cache_content_recover_size( cache_exportdir, inum ) ) == -1 )
00231                     {
00232                         DisplayLogJd(  pclient_inode->log_outputs, "Error when recovering size for file ID %llx", inum )  ;
00233                     }
00234                   else
00235                     pentry->object.file.attributes.filesize = (fsal_size_t)size_in_cache ;
00236 
00237                   /* Adding the cached entry to the data cache */
00238                   if( ( pentry_content = cache_content_new_entry( pentry, 
00239                                                                   NULL,
00240                                                                   pclient_data, 
00241                                                                   RECOVER_ENTRY,
00242                                                                   pcontext,
00243                                                                   &cache_content_status ) ) == NULL )
00244                    {
00245                     DisplayLogJd(  pclient_data->log_outputs, "Error adding cached data for file ID %llx, error=%d", 
00246                                    inum, cache_inode_status ) ;
00247                     continue ;
00248                    }
00249                   else
00250                     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00251                                        "Cached data added successfully for file ID %llx", inum ) ;
00252 
00253                    
00254                   if( ( cache_content_status = cache_content_valid( pentry_content, CACHE_CONTENT_OP_GET, pclient_data ) )  != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00255                    {
00256                       *pstatus = cache_content_status ;
00257                       return *pstatus ;
00258                    }
00259 
00260                 }
00261               
00262             } /*  while( ( dirent_export = readdir( export_directory ) ) != NULL ) */
00263           
00264           /* Close the export cache directory */
00265            cache_content_local_cache_closedir( &export_directory ) ;
00266           
00267         } /* if( ( found_export_id = cache_content_get_export_id( direntp->d_name ) ) > 0 ) */
00268     } /* while( ( direntp = readdir( cache_directory ) ) != NULL ) */
00269   
00270   /* Close the cache directory */
00271   closedir( cache_directory ) ;
00272     
00273 
00274   return *pstatus ;
00275 } /* cache_content_crash_recover */
00276
